thread.title: Milan boss Mihajlovic not convinced about Kevin Boateng's fitness
thread.title_full: Milan boss Mihajlovic not convinced about Kevin Boateng's fitness

title: Milan boss Mihajlovic not convinced about Kevin Boateng's fitness
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 19:40 CET Milan boss Mihajlovic not convinced about Kevin Boateng's fitness - www.ghanasoccernet.com Kevin Boateng on Milan return 
Italian newspapers are reporting AC Milan manager Sinisa Mihajlovic is not convinced Kevin-Prince Boateng has fully recovered from his knee problems. 
The 28-year-old free agent has been training with the Rossoneris and featured in their friendly win over Italian lower-tier side Monza on Thursday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
